channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.K.: Don’t You Dare Criticize Islam
item.description: The case of a Koran-burning reveals double standards in the English justice system.

item.title: Andrew Cuomo concedes to Zohran Mamdani in New York City Democratic mayoral primary

item.title: What Government Can and Can’t Do About Birth Rates
item.description: A change in marginal incentives can have salutary effects.

item.title: Charles Burnett’s California Before the Fall
item.description: A film record of the Golden State’s ongoing catastrophe.

item.title: Is Your Child’s Public School Teaching Eastern Mysticism Like This Chicago Classroom?
item.description: This is not simply a question of educational best practices; it’s a battle over worldview.

item.title: Governor Swaps Three Trustees Amid Rock-Bottom Free Speech Rankings For Indiana University
item.description: 'What is the scandal about a conservative Republican governor appointing conservatives to a position?' James Bopp said.

item.title: Court blocks Trump's attempt to strip fed workers of union rights

item.title: FBI Won’t Say If It Will Reinstate Whistleblowers Who Were Booted After Exposing Biden-Era Corruption
item.description: The FBI is refusing to say if it will reinstate whistleblowers who said they were previously retaliated against after disclosing information about the...

item.title: New Yorkers Know How to Fix Their City and Have Chosen Not To
item.description: I don’t have questions for the thoroughly absurd Zohran Mamdani. I have questions for New York’s electorate.

item.title: Capitol Hill divided on source of rising antisemitic violence

item.title: After Pointlessly Villainizing Conservatives, Prime Video’s Ballet Dramedy ‘Étoile’ Is Canceled
item.description: Writer Amy Sherman-Palladino thinks ballet can only be saved through gimmicks. She’s wrong.

item.title: America Will Be Better Off, And More Self-Reliant, Without Illegal Immigrant Labor
item.description: Not relying on illegal immigrant labor means we have to learn to take care of ourselves, much as Americans have for most of our history.

item.title: The Strikes on Iran Made the World Safer
item.description: With the cease-fire appearing to hold, the U.S.-Israeli operation has accomplished something historic.
